emulator.name: JEmu2
emulator.comment: Arcade classics playable on the Internet! Deployment is done using Java Web Start, enabling a one-click installation and automatic update mechanism. This means: no difficult installation procedures, and each time you start the game, this site is contacted for updates which are then installed completely automatic. Also has a unique "VirtuaArcade" mode where you can walk around a 3D arcade and play the game that you are looking at!
